name: Hilt II
overview: Originally a published game, but later made Public Domain by its creators. Translated to German in 2002 and released with extra levels. In it you control up to 6 characters who must venture through various worlds in order to destroy the enemy. To do this you must solve puzzles and cunningly use your forces to outwit and outmaneuver your computer opponent. Each move consists of any combination of possible actions, such as walking, using computers, firing weapons and so on.
